title: pes ev campus review
content:
is it true that there is absolutely no campus life in pesu like fests,events etc..?
do they only focus on academics and studies?

comments.body:
That's not true. We have a college fest every semester. One semester in electronic City campus and the other semester in ring road. We attend both. 

We have events almost every weekend. Sometimes there are more than one. As a club head/organiser, you'd struggle to find good dates to conduct your events on. 

Yes, PES does focus more on academics and some professors give you trouble but it's not true that you'll be required to study 24/7 and you won't have time for anything else in life.
Da fuck we have far more events than rr campus the clubs here conduct tons of events as for fest we have 2 every year once in rr and once in ec.
We got pes electric vehicles nowðŸ˜³ðŸ˜¹?
